summary: A foul-mouthed finishing school graduate mistakenly winds up on an ill-fated fishing boat and faces the wrath of a crew that considers him bad luck.
cast: Chris Elliott|Ritch Brinkley|James Gammon|Brian Doyle-Murray|Brion James|Melora Walters|I.M. Hobson|Alex Nevil|David Henry Sterry|Bob Elliott|Edward Flotard|Jim Cummings|David Letterman|Ann Magnuson|Russ Tamblyn|Ricki Lake|Mike Starr|Andy Richter|Alfred Molina|Ralph Moratz|Phil Proctor|Adam Reeves|Tommy Williamson
keywords: stupidity|ship|stop motion animation|profanity|child played by adult
title: Caos en alta mar
